Articles.Content:
In my current career save, I  launched a station into Mun polar orbit to perform the survey. After it didn't worked the first time, i attempted to send up alternate antennas and more batteries, but neither solved the problem. According to the debug menu the problem is "[Exception]: MissingMethodException: Method not found: 'IScienceDataTransmitter.TransmitData'." No modded parts on on the craft.

 

Installed mods: 

Taurus HCV 

Science Alert

Kerbal Alarm Clock
